column4: I need to install mplayer but i cant because it isnt in sources.list. what do i need to add that i can atp-get it?
https://wiki.ubuntu.com/RestrictedFormats
so i need to download it from the website, right. I cannot apt-get it?
https://wiki.ubuntu.com/RestrictedFormats#head-42ee8db829cfca66a3a0f4f71a6682392bbe459c
try mplayer-586
mplayer-586: Depends: libsvga1 but it is not installable or
bash: !find: event not found
did you enable universe too, or just multiverse? - you need universe to get the depends for mplayer.
oh i didnt. so i need to multiverse and universe?
yes.
ok, thanks.
where can i paste my sources.list that someone could see whats wrong with it?
because now i got W: You may want to run apt-get update to correct these problems
http://paste.ubuntulinux.nl
thanks
could you please watch whats wrong with that: http://paste.ubuntulinux.nl/279
did you do an 'apt-get update' ?
yeah but i got couple errors
you can use http://paste.ubuntulinux.nl/38 as an example.
hey but i tried it second time and now i didnt get. guess it was somekind of download bug?
probably just a download bug.
or whats its called. but thank you very mutch.
now it works. thank you again.
no problem :)
